title: Japanese star Sasaki says he's joining Dodgers
description: Roki Sasaki, the prized Japanese pitching prospect who has had scouts drooling over his potential since high school, has chosen the Los Angeles Dodgers as his major league team, he announced on Instagram on Friday.
author: Alden Gonzalez

title: Heat's Butler to start, says of future, 'I'm back'
description: With his seven-game suspension over, Jimmy Butler returned to the Heat's starting lineup Friday night against the Nuggets and addressed his future plans with a short statement: "I'm back."
author: Tim Bontemps

title: Man Utd and Scotland legend Law dies aged 84
description: Former Scotland, Manchester City and Manchester United striker Denis Law - the only Scottish player to have won the Ballon d'Or award - has died at the age of 84.

title: Trump into Masters semis and sets earnings record
description: World number one Judd Trump will play world champion Kyren Wilson in the last four of the Masters after beating Ding Junhui.

title: Release clause removed as Haaland signs HUGE Man City contract
description: Erling Haaland has signed a new nine-and-a-half-year contract to keep him at Manchester City until the summer of 2034.

title: Haaland's new contract: The key questions answered
description: Erling Haaland has signed an extraordinary nine-and-a-half-year contract at Manchester City but what do we know about the finances of the deal?

title: 'It's just hooping': Despite obvious changes, Unrivaled stars are ready for new league
description: While there are significant differences from the 3x3 game we've seen in FIBA and Olympic play, many of the stars have some degree of familiarity with the format.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Alex Ovechkin goals tracker: The Great Eight 21 away from breaking Wayne Gretzkyâ€™s all-time record of 894
description: We're tracking Alex Ovechkin's chase for Wayne Gretzky's all-time goals record of 894.
author: Yahoo Sports
